result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Ryan Michael Richardson

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Ryan Michael Richardson, defendant appeared in Court in custody with counsel Joseph Pecora.
Jordan W. Feest appeared as prosecuting attorney. Defendant withdraws all previously placed Not Guilty by Reason of Insanity pleas. Defendant pleas and is sentenced as on Signed Statement of Plea Agreement. Court accepts psychological evaluation by Dr. Kent Berney in it's entirety. Clerks notes on unsigned copy of Signed Statement of Plea Agreement is scanned in under this court record event.

Ryan Michael Richardson, defendant appeared in Court in custody with counsel Joseph Pecora.
Laura Kohl appeared as prosecuting attorney. Doctor Bernie needs more time to finish report, matter set over.  Hearing scheduled for June 21, 2017 at 10:00 am.

Ryan Michael Richardson, defendant appeared in Court in custody with counsel Joseph Pecora.
Jeffrey Duane Kohl appeared as prosecuting attorney. Review of previously ordered mental health examination. Examiner has been appointed, had been given 60 days to file report.  Hearing scheduled for May 26, 2017 at 09:30 am.

Ryan Michael Richardson, defendant appeared in Court in custody with counsel Joseph Pecora.
Laura Kohl appeared as prosecuting attorney.
Motion hearing on March 6, 2017 at 04:00 pm.

Ryan Michael Richardson, defendant appeared in Court in custody with counsel Joseph Pecora.
Laura Kohl appeared as prosecuting attorney. Matter set over.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for February 21, 2017 at 08:30 am.

Ryan Michael Richardson, defendant appeared in Court in custody with counsel Joseph Pecora.
Jeffrey Duane Kohl appeared as prosecuting attorney. Atty Pecora to draft court order that he be given records. Matter set over for a status conference, and then a DA Pre-trial conference.  Status conference scheduled for January 23, 2017 at 02:00 pm.

Ryan Michael Richardson, defendant appeared in Court in person with counsel Joseph Pecora.
Jeffrey Duane Kohl appeared as prosecuting attorney.  Status conference scheduled for December 22, 2016 at 09:00 am.

Ryan Michael Richardson, defendant appeared in Court in custody with counsel Joseph Pecora.
Jeffrey Duane Kohl appeared as prosecuting attorney. Atty Pecora requests a competency evaluation on his client for all matters. Granted by the court. Wisconsin Forensic Unit to conduct evaluation, Defendant to be transported for the evaluation.  Review hearing scheduled for November 28, 2016 at 03:00 pm.

Ryan Michael Richardson, defendant appeared in Court in custody with counsel Joseph Pecora.
Jeffrey Duane Kohl appeared as prosecuting attorney. Defendant has been having suicidal thoughts, Attorney recommends for an immediate chapter 15. Defendant waive preliminary hearing.  Matter referred to the corporation counsel.  Status conference scheduled for November 8, 2016 at 08:32 am.
Ryan Michael Richardson, defendant does not appear in Court.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for October 25, 2016 at 10:30 am.

Ryan Michael Richardson, defendant appeared in Court in person without counsel.
Gary L. Luhman appeared as prosecuting attorney.

Violation: Disorderly Conduct
Issuing Agency: Green County Sheriff's Office
Conditions:   May not possess or consume any intoxicants.  No violent or abusive contact with: M.L.R.

Ryan Michael Richardson, defendant appeared in Court in person with counsel Guy Mason Taylor.
Gary L. Luhman appeared as prosecuting attorney.  Court advises defendant of rights.  Court advises defendant of charges and penalties.  Defendant waives reading of complaint.  Defendant given complaint.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for August 16, 2016 at 08:30 am.
